org.hibernate.boot.model.domain

Interface ValueMapping<J>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BasicValueMapping<J>, EmbeddedValueMapping, EmbeddedValueMappingImplementor, Fetchable, ForeignKeyExporter, KeyValue, Value<J>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Any, Array, Bag, BasicValue, Collection, Component, DependantValue, IdentifierBag, IdentifierCollection, IndexedCollection, List, ManyToOne, Map, OneToMany, OneToOne, PrimitiveArray, Set, SimpleValue, ToOne

    public interface ValueMapping<J>
    Corollary to Navigable in the runtime model

    • Method Summary

      • getMetadataBuildingContext

        MetadataBuildingContext getMetadataBuildingContext()
        todo (6.0) : ? - expose this as LocalMetadataBuildingContext to get access to `#getOrigin`? all ValueMapping should be created relative to a local MetadataBuildingContext. Using LocalMetadataBuildingContext would give us access to Origin which defines the localized mapping info (attribute, class, etc) which is useful for error messages
